titleStmt.title: Samuel G. Suddarth, Receipt to William Stewart
CWG13781

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.idno: QMG Box 10; Folder 1864 Clothing, Camp & Garrison Equipage, Telegraph Expenses, Some Claim Letters; Bundle 1

body.p:
No. 22.
The State of Kentucky,
To William Stewart, Dr.

row.cell: To Services rendered in aiding the Inspector General to organize the State Militia during the Month of November

body.p: The Quarter Master General of Kentucky will pay the above account out of the Militia fund.

Thos E Bramlette
Govr of Kentucky
I certify that the above account is correct and just; that the services were rendered as stated; and that they were necessary for the public service.

D. W. Lindsey
Inspector Quarter-Master Gen. Ky.

Received at Frankfort, Kentucky, the 30 of Novr. 1864, of S. G. SUDDARTH, Quarter-master General of Kentucky Volunteers, the sum of Eighty Three Dollars, and Thirty four Cents, in full of the above account.

No. 22.
The State of Kentucky,
To William Stewart, Dr.

row.cell: To Services rendered in aiding the Inspector General in organizing the State Militia during the month of November

body.p: The Quarter Master General of Kentucky will pay this a/c out of the Militia Fund.

Thos E Bramlette
Govr of Kentucky
I certify that the above account is correct and just; that the services were rendered as stated; and that they were necessary for the public service.

D. W. Lindsey
Inspector Quarter-Master Gen. Ky.

Received at Frankfort, Kentucky, the 30th of Novr. 1864, of S. G. SUDDARTH, Quarter-master General of Kentucky Volunteers, the sum of Eighty Three Dollars and thirty four Cents, in full of the above account.

No. 22.
No. Abstract B Qr. 186.
William Stewart
Dollars 83. 34/100
Paid Novr 30th, 1864.
27
